name: (Bullet Hell)³
description:
(Bullet Hell)³ is essentially 3 games running at the same time. The player must travel between layers in order to get a highscore and to make sure each layer doesn't become too overrun with enemies.

Along the way the player will encounter 3 different enemy types, find powerups in order to help them in the game, and encounter a tough elite enemy who will provide quite the challenge.

Use bullets, rocket (which effect all layers at the same time) and your vertical boost in order to dodge enemies and destroy them.

Music for this game was sourced from: http://www.audiorhapsody.com/
